generatedPrompts.backCover: A minimalist Pop Art design bringing the card's story to a peaceful close. The background is a solid, vibrant magenta, covered in a subtle pattern of darker magenta halftone dots. A stylized graphic of two intertwined gold wedding rings, rendered with bold black outlines and a shiny comic book effect, is featured in the upper-left quadrant. A few graphic-style white olive leaves float gently around the rings. The design is simple, elegant, and uses the same bold lines and color palette from the front cover. The bottom-right corner is left completely empty.
generatedPrompts.frontCover:
A Pop Art wedding card in the style of Roy Lichtenstein. A vibrant cartoon couple stands before a stylized Greek Orthodox church with iconic blue domes in Agrinio, Greece. The background is a bright, sunny yellow with bold halftone dots. The groom, a cartoon man with black hair and sunglasses, smiles broadly. The bride, a cartoon woman in a flowing white dress, looks lovingly at him. Beside them, a little cartoon boy in a tiny suit holds a ring pillow, and a little cartoon girl in a frilly dress scatters graphic-style flower petals. The scene is framed with bold, black comic book lines. The color palette is energetic: cerulean blue, sunshine yellow, and vibrant magenta. In the center, the text "Congratulations on Your Wedding" is written in a beautiful, flowing, black handwritten cursive script. The style is joyful, energetic, and romantic.

CRITICAL CHARACTER REFERENCE INSTRUCTIONS: I have provided multiple reference photos as input images. You MUST create cartoon/illustrated characters that accurately represent the people in these reference photos with high fidelity to their appearance.

MANDATORY CHARACTER MATCHING REQUIREMENTS:
- REPRESENT ALL PEOPLE: If multiple reference photos are provided, create cartoon versions of ALL people shown, bringing them together in the same scene
- EXACT hair color, hair style, and hair length from each reference photo
- PRECISE facial features for each person: eye color, eye shape, nose shape, face structure, skin tone
- ACCURATE clothing: replicate the EXACT clothing items, colors, patterns, and styles worn by each person in their reference photo
- COMPLETE accessories: include ALL accessories visible on each person (glasses, jewelry, hats, watches, bags, etc.)
- CORRECT body proportions and posture as shown for each person in their reference
- FAITHFUL age representation and gender presentation for each individual
- AUTHENTIC facial expressions and poses from the reference images, lean towards making the people look happier unless the user specifically asks for a different expression
- GROUP COMPOSITION: If multiple people, arrange them naturally together in a pleasing composition that fits the card's theme

The man has sun glasses the lady wearing a white dress 
Two young children 😀 only
 flower girl and  boy Ring bearer for the wedding 

The cartoon style should be charming and artistic while preserving complete visual accuracy to the reference photo. Every person in the reference must be represented with their exact appearance, clothing, and accessories.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: An explosive Pop Art composition celebrating the journey from New York to Greece. A stylized, graphic map shows a bold, dotted line arching from a pop art rendition of the New York skyline (represented by a simplified skyscraper) to a pop art depiction of the Parthenon in Greece. The background is split diagonally: one half is a pattern of blue and white Greek key motifs, the other half is a field of vibrant yellow with bold black outlines. At the center where the two backgrounds meet, a large, graphic heart in magenta with halftone dot shading radiates energy lines, symbolizing the love that connects the two places. The overall design is dynamic, colorful, and abstract, using the card's signature cerulean blue, magenta, and yellow palette.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior:
A stunning Pop Art design framing the wedding message. A large, stylized white olive tree branch, rendered with thick black comic-book outlines, sweeps gracefully from the top left corner down towards the bottom right. The leaves are a vibrant cerulean blue with halftone dot shading. Interspersed among the leaves are small, graphic hearts in bright magenta. This decorative element frames a clean, white central area where the message is beautifully written. The background is a solid, sunny yellow. The message reads: "Dearest Michael and Alexis,

Your beautiful family from Smithtown traveled all the way to this incredible day in Greece. Your love story is an inspiration, and we are so honored to celebrate with you as you begin this new chapter together. May your life be as vibrant, joyful, and full of love as your wedding day!

All our love,
The Gilbert Family" in an elegant, legible, black handwritten cursive script with a natural, warm feel.
